description: This file implements the `PermissionsClient` class which provides methods for managing permissions via gRPC calls, including enumeration, retrieval, granting, setting, revoking, deletion, authorization, and some application-specific functions.

classes.name: PermissionsClient
classes.description: A client class for interacting with the permissions service over gRPC, including methods for permission management.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::PermissionsClient
methods.description: Constructor initializing with endpoint and TLS option.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::PermissionsClient
methods.description: Constructor initializing with endpoint and credentials.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::CreateChannel
methods.description: Creates a gRPC channel with optional TLS based on parameters.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::EnumeratePermissions
methods.description: Requests a list of permissions for a specific app, filtered by provided criteria.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Get
methods.description: Retrieves application permissions for a specified app and partner.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Grant
methods.description: Grants specific permissions to an app.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Set
methods.description: Sets permissions for an application, including bundles, includes, and excludes.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Revoke
methods.description: Revokes specified permissions from an app.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Authorize
methods.description: Authorizes permissions based on a session token.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::GetAllForApp
methods.description: Retrieves all permissions for a specific app.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::GetThorToken
methods.description: Obtains a Thor token for a specific content provider and session parameters.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::GetRegisteredPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves registered permissions for the bearer token.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::RegisterPermissions
methods.description: Registers a list of permissions, optionally replacing all.

methods.name: uint32_t Authorize(const std::string & sessionToken,const std::vector<std::string> & filters,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<std::string> & outPermissions) const
std::shared_ptr<grpc::Channel> CreateChannel(const std::string & endpoint,const std::shared_ptr<grpc::ChannelCredentials> & creds)
uint32_t Delete(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId) const

uint32_t DeleteRegisteredPermission(const ottx::permission::Permission & permission,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId) const

uint32_t EnumeratePermissions(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::vector<std::string> & filters,std::vector<std::string> & outPermissions) const

uint32_t Get(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const
uint32_t GetAllAppKeys(const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::AppKeys> & outKeys) const

uint32_t GetAllForApp(const std::string & app,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions> & outList) const

uint32_t GetRegisteredPermissions(const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::Permission> & outPermissions) const

uint32_t GetThorToken(const std::string & app,const std::string & contentProvider,const std::string & deviceSessionId,const std::string & appSessionId,const std::string & tokenMode,int32_t ttl,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::string & outToken) const

uint32_t Grant(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::vector<std::string> & bundles,const std::vector<std::string> & permissions,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const

uint32_t RegisterPermissions(const std::vector<ottx::permission::Permission> & permissions,bool replaceAll,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId) const

uint32_t Revoke(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::vector<std::string> & bundles,const std::vector<std::string> & permissions,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const

uint32_t Set(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::vector<std::string> & bundles,const std::vector<std::string> & includes,const std::vector<std::string> & excludes,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const
void SetCommonMetadata(grpc::ClientContext & ctx,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId)
